dcterms:creator: Cristian Danescu-Niculescu-Mizil
Lillian Lee
dcterms:description: The Cornell Movie Dialogues corpus features two-character dialogues from movie scripts, capturing a large variety of human interaction in many different fictional circumstances. This dataset consists of 60,000 <history, response> pairs, with an average of 3.5 previous utterances per conversation.
dcterms:title: Cornell Movie Dialogues

dcterms:creator: Saizheng Zhang
Emily Dinan
Jack Urbanek
Arthur Szlam
Douwe Kiela
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: The PersonaChat dataset contains conversations constructed by assigning 'personas' to two Mechanical Turkers. Each persona is a list of attributes about the individual, such as 'I love pizza.' The conversations are longer, with an average of 14 utterances per conversation, allowing for more abstract representations of the input conversation history.
dcterms:title: PersonaChat
